instruction: Rewrite the following sentence so that it symobilizes a different emotion.
input: I was devastated when I heard the news.
output: I was elated when I heard the news.

instruction: Update the following Wikipedia article about cats by adding one new sentence that is not already mentioned in the article.
input: Cats are small, carnivorous mammals in the family Felidae, often referred to as the domestic cats to distinguish them from wild members of the family.
output: Cats are known for their flexibility and intelligence, as they can learn some basic commands and activities from their owners.

instruction: Explain why you think a certain type of food is healthy.
output: Avocados are very healthy because they are high in beneficial unsaturated fats, important nutrients like vitamins C and E, and fibre. They can help lower cholesterol levels and regulate blood sugar, and provide antioxidants which can reduce risk of some cancers. Additionally, they are low in carbohydrates and provide a good source of protein.

instruction: Analyze the following poem and explain the tone and themes of the poem.
input:
"The woods are lovely, dark and deep, 

But I have promises to keep, 

And miles to go before I sleep, 

And miles to go before I sleep."
output: The poem "Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening" by Robert Frost is a reflection on the beauty and temporary nature of life. The tone of the poem is contemplative and melancholic, as the speaker contemplates their own mortality and the futility of trying to make lasting marks in life. The poem's themes are mortality, promises, and beauty in the face of death. The speaker is reminded of their duty to keep promises and of how futile their life's endeavors will be in the grand scheme of things. The poem ultimately conveys a message of fragility and the peace that can be found in embracing death and the beauty of life.

instruction: Write a email to an online store demanding a refund for an item that you recently purchased.
output:
Dear [Store Name],

I am quite dissatisfied with the item that I recently purchased from your online store. The item was significantly different than what was advertised, so I am requesting a full and immediate refund.

I have included the item details and purchase information below.

[Item Details]
[Purchase Information]

I look forward to a speedy resolution to this issue.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

instruction: Given some ingredients, generate a recipe.
input: 2 tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 cup of cooked beans
output: Chop the tomatoes and onion into small pieces. Then heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan. Add the tomatoes, onion, and cooked beans. Stir in 1 tablespoon of cumin and 1 teaspoon of oregano. Cook for 10 minutes and serve hot.

instruction: Write a story about a person whose life changed in an unexpected way.
output: Her life had always been predictable and mundane, but one day it all changed in an unexpected way. She was walking through the park when she stumbled across a mysterious door. Curiosity compelled her to open it, and she stepped into a world of adventure and mystery. She soon realised that some things in life are beyond our control and we must make the best of the unexpected opportunities that come our way.

instruction: Automatically generate a headline given an article.
input: Deep learning promises improved medical imaging performance
output: Deep Learning: The Future of Medical Imaging Performance

instruction: Given some text and a keyword, find the synonyms of the keyword in the text.
input:
The fox is a small furry animal.
Animal
output: The fox is a small furry creature.

instruction: Given a list of sports, determine the rules for each game.
output:
Football: Football is a team sport played between two teams of eleven players each. The goal is to score points by advancing an object into the opponent's goal.

Basketball: Basketball is a team sport played on a court by two teams of five players each. The goal is to score points by shooting a ball through a hoop at the opponents basket.

instruction: Given a piece of text, convert it into a questionnaire.
input: Acme Corp struggled with quality and customer service issues last year.
output: What challenges did Acme Corp experience with quality and customer service last year?

instruction: Given a description of a personal event, write a verse in haiku style.
input: Swimming in the sea on a sunny day
output:
Crystal waves inviting me
The sun's warmth on my skin
Gladness for this day.

instruction: Given a database table and specific database queries, create an interactive report with charts and visuals.
output: Create a interactive report by running the given database queries and displaying the results in a graphical format, such as bar graphs, line graphs, pie charts, etc.

instruction: Given a dataset, generate a machine learning model to identify patterns in the data.
output: Generate a machine learning model, such as a Decision Tree, to identify patterns in the given dataset.

instruction: Given two text documents, determine which one is the most relevant given a keyword.
input:
Document 1: Acme Corp had challenges with quality and customer service last year
Document 2: Acme Corp had a successful year with high profits and customer satisfaction
Keyword: customer service
output: Document 1 is the most relevant, since it mentions the keyword "customer service".

instruction: Given a marketing piece, rewrite it in a more conversational style.
input: Acme Corp offers a range of high-quality products designed to meet all your needs.
output: At Acme Corp, we understand that your needs are unique, so we've designed our products to be of the highest quality and meet all of your needs.

instruction: Generate a potential business name related to pet food industry
output: Happy Pet Nosh

instruction: How to scan documents on your phone
output: Scanning documents with your phone is a simple process. First, open the camera app on your phone. Then, lay the document you wish to scan on a flat surface. Position your phone so that the document fits fully within the frame on your phone's screen. The app will take the picture, which you can review to make sure it's proper. After that, the app will convert the picture into a PDF file stored on your phone.

instruction: Write a short story involving a protagonist with a supernatural power
output:
Alice was just an ordinary girl, or so she thought. But when she turned sixteen, she discovered she had a special power. She could read peopleâ€™s minds. She was scared of her new abilities at first, but with time, she learnt to control it and use it for good.

Alice started using her powers to help out her friends in tough situations. She had a special knack for finding out the truth, and her friends started counting on her. She quickly realized that she was the only one who could help them. With her special power, she was able to find out the information that would normally be hidden.

Alice soon became a hero to her friends and family, always rescuing them with her special power.

instruction: Make a suggestion for improving a website
output: A suggestion for improving the website is to add a feature that allows users to create wishlists. Adding a wishlist feature would enable customers to easily save and organize products they're interested in, making it easier for them to come back and buy the item at a later date.
